pullRequest.title: [#1501] Add tests to FeedbackRankOptionsQuestionDetails
pullRequest.bodyText:
Part of #1501
Outline of Solution
Add some tests to ensure the invalid question setup does result in the corresponding error messages for debugging and development purposes.
Can I check if this is the right way to do tests in the backend?

nodes.bodyText: you can add more whitespace to one of them
why do you clear when the variable is not going to be used after this? same at other places
I think it'd be better to have the closing bracket on a new line, would be easy to miss the value 1 here
I don't think this needs to be public (at most package level)? In fact I don't think any of the constants already defined here needs to be public.
I won't advise trying to change this here. You'll soon realize how much change this would necessitate.
